transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, good morning.
Executive: Uh, good morning sir. This side Kavita Rawat from IndiaMART.
Customer: Yes, Kavita Rawat. Tell me Kavita Rawat.
Executive: How are you, sir?
Customer: I'm good, Kavita Rawat.
Executive: Sir, uh, last week we did na video meet, that not done properly.
Customer: No, no, today not, today not possible. Tomorrow not possible. Next Monday or Friday only possible. I am in outstation, computer not available, Kavita Rawat.
Executive: So, can I call you on Monday?
Customer: Uh, first you have to call me Monday or Sunday evening if possible, you have to call me, okay?
Executive: Monday evening. Uh, Sunday evening call me, Kavita Rawat.
Executive: Sir, Sunday evening is not possible. We have only.
Customer: If you have mobile phone, if you have mobile phone, you have to contact with me in Zoom. We are let's discuss with discussing, no issues.
Executive: So, can I call you on Monday?
Customer: So I will call you on Monday.
Executive: Uh, okay, Kavita Rawat.
Executive: Which time?
Customer: Uh, first you have to call me 9:00, 9:30, let we discuss.
Executive: Okay, okay, I will call you on Monday, okay?
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to reschedule video meet.

- Customer is unavailable until next Monday/Friday.



Resolution:

- Executive will call customer on Monday.

- Agreed to discuss at 9:00-9:30 AM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, reschedule, availability
